Body:
""" Test application logging.
    
    """
message = 'core.logger test'
logger.critical(message)
_, stderr = capsys.readouterr()
assert not stderr
logger.start('debug')
try:
    assert logger.level == DEBUG
    logger.critical(message)
finally:
    logger.stop()
_, stderr = capsys.readouterr()
assert message in stderr
return
